DOC.brief_summary: The goal of our study is to examine eye color at birth and the longitudinal change in eye color of preterm and full-term newborns.
DOC.brief_title: Iris Colors in Neonates: Do They Really Change? Prevalence, Predicting Factors and Associated Characteristics
DOC.criteria: Any baby born between the 2442 week of gestation admitted to the wellbaby nursery or the NICU whose parents have signed an informed consent. Neonatal conjunctivitis Neonatal sepsis Inborn error of metabolism or genetic syndrome Eye abnormalities Parental refusal
